document_data.name: ''Gorgol's Asylum''
document_data.mainbody: '''Gorgol's Asylum''' was one of the unique ''Fading [[Ring]]s'' that possessed defensive magic only usable by [[sorcerer]]s.
document_data.Description: ''Gorgol's Asylum'' was a cold metallic latticework ring.
document_data.Powers: Gorgol's ring possessed a ''+3'' enchantment similar to a powerful ''[[ring of protection]]''. Additionally, the ring gave the wearer the ability to cast ''[[globe of invulnerability]]''.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], ''Gorgol's Asylum'' was in the possession of a mysterious monument, ''the Great Stone Head'', located in the [[Nightingale Court]] in the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]]. In exchange for one of the ''[[eidolon]]s'', small totem statues depicting various gods and demons, the monument dispensed powerful magic rings, one being the ''Gorgol's Asylum''.
